elements.name: Redirigir a la sección "Sobre nosotros" y mostrar la información correcta

steps.name: I am on the home page for information
I click on the "Sobre nosotros" menu option
I should be redirected to the "Sobre nosotros" section
I should see the description, history, and values

I navigate to the catalog section for search products
I search for a product with the keyword "Producto 1"
I should see only products that match the keyword "Producto 1"

elements.name: Filtrar productos por parte de palabra clave

steps.name: I am on the home page for search products
I navigate to the catalog section for search products
I search for a product with the keyword "Producto"
I should see only products that match the keyword "Producto"

elements.name: Filtrar productos con palabra clave inexistente

I navigate to the catalog section for search products
I search for a product with the keyword "nonexistent"
I should see only products that match the keyword "nonexistent"

elements.name: Enviar un correo desde la sección de contacto con éxito

steps.name: I am on the home page for contact
I navigate to the contact section
I fill in the contact form with "John Doe", "john@example.com", and "Hello, this is a test message."
I submit the contact form
I should see a success message indicating that the email was sent successfully
